testcase.name: Safari Checkout Verification - End to End › should verify comprehensive Safari success scenarios
testcase.system-out: 📋 Testing comprehensive Safari success scenarios 🧪 Testing scenario: PayPal Safari Payment ✅ PayPal Safari Payment: Success page loaded correctly ✅ PayPal Safari Payment: Amount £29.99 displayed ✅ PayPal Safari Payment: Order ID PAYPAL_SAFARI_001 displayed 🧪 Testing scenario: Apple Pay Safari Payment ✅ Apple Pay Safari Payment: Success page loaded correctly ✅ Apple Pay Safari Payment: Amount £19.99 displayed ✅ Apple Pay Safari Payment: Order ID APPLEPAY_SAFARI_002 displayed 🧪 Testing scenario: Card Safari Payment (with delays) ✅ Card Safari Payment (with delays): Success page loaded correctly ✅ Card Safari Payment (with delays): Amount £34.99 displayed ✅ Card Safari Payment (with delays): Order ID CARD_SAFARI_003 displayed 📋 Safari scenarios testing completed
